name: You Lose Chess
description:
No matter how good you are at chess, you will lose this game. You may be brilliant at playing chess by the book - but this chess engine does not care about any books. It transcends chess, if it has to. Even if you manage to win a single game that will be only the beginning of a long and arduous journey.

  • Incredibly strong chess engine that knows rules and tricks even grandmasters have never heard of!
  • An opponent who is not only mean, but also very unfair!
  • A barrage of bad jokes about your ability to play chess!
  • Unlimited lives: Lose and lose and lose again!
  • Full of special effects never seen before in a chess game!
  • Lots of options already chosen for you and other KILLER features!
  • Cheat mode available for players who are not up to the challenge.

Get pwnd now!
